Can a person shorten their own life by using the Death Note? I was reading about the rules of the Death Note on Death Note wiki and I came across this certain rule...
What does this rule mean?
Does it mean that when Light uses the Death Note, he loses some of his life? I find it unlikely since he would have died quite a while ago.

Could I kill myself with a Death Note?

This page is taken from the pilot chapter of Death Note. Would the manga pilot be considered canon? And thus, would I be able to kill myself with the Death Note or not?
